thread.title: The Sariska Palace Offers Luxury Experience To Visitors
thread.title_full: The Sariska Palace Offers Luxury Experience To Visitors

title: The Sariska Palace Offers Luxury Experience To Visitors
text: The Sariska Palace Offers Luxury Experience To Visitors , 9 October 2015 -- Regal charm of the place makes it a huge attraction for travelersThe Sariska Palace , renowned for its royal aesthetics has offered exciting new deals for travelers who come to Alwar to explore its natural beauty and take in the sites. Alwar, Rajasthan has been getting its due as a tourist attraction for some time now. The place is known for its architectural marvels besides stunning natural beauty, which makes it a hit with travelers. The Sariska National Park is one of the biggest tourist destinations in the area and holidaymakers who want to visit the place with their loved one, friends or families can ensure that they are in the lap of luxury by staying at this gorgeous property. Sariska Palace Alwar is known for its 85 royal rooms that are the hallmark of this heritage hotel. Its imperial French architecture makes it a sight to behold and the state of the art amenities ensure that travelers can have a comfortable stay when they are here. The Royal Chambers are ideal for honeymooning couples and family holidaymakers who want to get nothing but the best during their stay. The standard rooms also have their own benchmark of luxury for travelers. The spa and fitness arrangements at the hotel are top notch, and the multi cuisine restaurant ticks the right boxes for guests with their specific requirements. About Sariska Palace Built in the 19th century by the Maharaja of Alwar, it was converted into a forest reserve six decades ago and a National Park in 1982. It holds the regal charm and offers travelers complete luxury experience when they are in the stunning city of Alwar. Media Contact Address: Sariska, dist: Alwar, Rajasthan 301022, India Email:
